    another_one

    another_one.Rmd
    name = "another_one.Rmd"
ao_value = 23
    # Hello, a comment
cat("Hello world\n")
#> Hello world

    Child

    # this is from a child Rmd
# Here we declare a shared element

childEnv = new.env()

childEnv$name = sprintf("child-%s", rnorm(1))

# what's in parent env ?
    # this will be shown, but not evaluated
stop("This would have thrown an error")

    ** End of child **

    self

    childEnv
#> <environment: 0x7fe13c307dd8>
as.list(childEnv)
#> $name
#> [1] "child--1.27995564628985"
#> 
#> $seed
#> [1] -0.8882472

childEnv$another_one = T
as.list(childEnv)
#> $name
#> [1] "child--1.27995564628985"
#> 
#> $seed
#> [1] -0.8882472
#> 
#> $another_one
#> [1] TRUE
